name: Greek Gods Race
description:
Choose one greek god between Athena, Hestia, Ares and Zeus. Run as long as you can, collecting jars of nectar and defeating the others to reach the top of gods!

This game was made for  Mini Jam 7th edition with theme Greek Mythology!

Controls:

You can select a god to control and the others going to be controlled by cpu.

In the main screen, use the following keys to select a god. You can play this game with up to four people, only select the character and it will be playable.
- 2 - Select the Athena
- X - Select the Hestia
- N - Select the Ares
- 9 - Select the Zeus

The god selected in the main screen, can be controlled in game using the following keys:

Athena:
- Key 1: Move Right
- Key 2: Power (lances)
- Key 3: Move Left

Hestia:
- Key Z: Move Right
- Key X: Power (flame)
- Key C: Move Left

Ares:
- Key B: Move Right
- Key N: Power (ball of thorns)
- Key M: Move Left

Zeus:
- Key 8: Move Right
- Key 9: Power (lightning bolts)
- Key 0: Move Left

Thanks for playing!
